languages.text: "Планетарный бунт... как можно было допустить восстание еретиков такого масштаба? Неужто Райкад лишен зрячих и верных, что могли бы поднять тревогу?"
"A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"
languages.original_text: "Планетарный бунт... как можно было допустить восстание еретиков такого масштаба? Неужто Райкад лишен зрячих и верных, что могли бы поднять тревогу?"

languages.text: “整颗行星都发生了暴乱……怎么可能会发生如此大规模的异端暴动？难道整个莱卡德上下，就没有一位忠诚的公民可以预见到这样的事情，提前进行警告吗？”
languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"

traits.locale_text: “整颗行星都发生了暴乱……怎么可能会发生如此大规模的异端暴动？难道整个莱卡德上下，就没有一位忠诚的公民可以预见到这样的事情，提前进行警告吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Toute une planète qui se révolte... Comment un soulèvement hérétique d'une telle ampleur a-t-il pu avoir lieu sans que personne ne tire la sonnette d'alarme ? N'y a-t-il donc sur Rykad plus aucun citoyen digne de ce nom ? »
languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"

traits.locale_text: « Toute une planète qui se révolte... Comment un soulèvement hérétique d'une telle ampleur a-t-il pu avoir lieu sans que personne ne tire la sonnette d'alarme ? N'y a-t-il donc sur Rykad plus aucun citoyen digne de ce nom ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eine planetenweite Revolte ... Wie kann ein ketzerischer Aufstand von solchen Ausmaßen zugelassen werden? Gibt es auf Rykad keinerlei treue Bürger, die das hätten vorhersehen und Alarm schlagen können?"
languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"

traits.locale_text: "Eine planetenweite Revolte ... Wie kann ein ketzerischer Aufstand von solchen Ausmaßen zugelassen werden? Gibt es auf Rykad keinerlei treue Bürger, die das hätten vorhersehen und Alarm schlagen können?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「惑星全土の反乱…異端者の暴動というこの重大事をなぜ起こるがままにさせていた？ライカドには、この事態を予測し継承を鳴らせる信仰心ある市民が全くいないというのか？」
languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"

traits.locale_text: 「惑星全土の反乱…異端者の暴動というこの重大事をなぜ起こるがままにさせていた？ライカドには、この事態を予測し継承を鳴らせる信仰心ある市民が全くいないというのか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Una rebelión de escala planetaria... ¿Cómo ha podido surgir un alzamiento hereje de esta magnitud? ¿Es que no hay ningún ciudadano fiel en Rykad que haya podido levantar la alarma?».
languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"

traits.locale_text: «Una rebelión de escala planetaria... ¿Cómo ha podido surgir un alzamiento hereje de esta magnitud? ¿Es que no hay ningún ciudadano fiel en Rykad que haya podido levantar la alarma?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"

languages.text: "Gezegen çapında bir ayaklanma... Bu ölçüde bir kâfirce ayaklanmaya nasıl müsaade edildi? Rykad'da bunu fark edip milleti ihtar edecek hiç mi sadık vatandaş kalmadı?"
languages.original_text: "A planet-wide revolt... How could a heretic uprising of this magnitude be allowed to happen? Is Rykad completely devoid of any faithful citizens who could have foreseen this and raised the alarm?"
